Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • Stats
      • Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Character
extends Stats
implements java.io.Serializable

    Character class

    The Class is used to crate a Character which can then be used in combat simulations

    Since:
    2014-12-01
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
